the dalu patawu galata pena hunnasgiri muduna ee wagemayi methanata hunnasgiri mudunath harima apuruwata penawa.hunnasgiri nagina wisthara ehemath ee ayiyagen danaganna puluwan una.yana para pennala dipu ape sahodara gaman sagaya ethanin aapahu haruna.apita karapu udawu walata pin dila api pennapu para dige pallam bassa.demala manussayek unath budusaranayi mahaththayo gihin enna kiyala kiyanna tharam ee manussaya karunika una.nandunana palathakadi hambechcha ee manussakama hadawathe randagena api pahalata aawa.ena magadi api dennata thiyena keti parawalwalatath wada keti parawal hoyanna gihin agal asse badagannath una.kohomahari bohoma ikmanata api parata aapahu watuna.ee naginna patangaththa thanata wada tawumata bohoma langin.bas holt ekak withara payin gihin alkaduwa handiyata aapu api denna handiye tap ekakin wathura bigena bigena gihin langama thibba podi kadekata gihin ispanchiyak ehema kala nuwara bas ekata nagagaththa.ee wenakota welawa dawal dekata withara athi.

‘akshan ri ple’ okthobar masaye di thiragatha karannata balaporoththuwa sitiyath dan athi wi thibena pramadaya nisa niyamitha masayedi eya pradarshanayata nikuth karannata hakiwedayi ehi nishpadakawarun saka pala karamin sitinawa.‘akshan ri ple’ chithrapatayen pasuwa prawina chithrapata adhyaksha sanje lila bansalige ‘gusarish’ nam wu chithrapataye rangannatath aishwarya ekanga wi sitinawa.ikmaninma suwapath wi nawathath purudu paridi chithrapatawala rangannata aishwarya nawatha paminena thuru ayage rasika pirisa das dalwagena bala sitina bawayi boliwudpurayen danagannata labune.sujiwa thewahettige

wiwidha dakshatha kusalatha athi ayata ekama thalayaka tharangayata ida denna yayi kiyaddi, ekama thalayakata ida dima wenuwata, me me ayata athi adupadu me me eewa yayi kiyagena eewaye adupadu piyawannata bedanna danna aya athayi kiyagath aya se ma mowun da katayuthu karathi.

emangin agamathi ranil wikramasinha palamuwani wagauththarakaru lesath, ejapa maha lekamwaraya dewani wagauththarakaru lesath, parlimenthu maha lekamwaraya thewani wagauththarakaru lesath, lanka bankuwa ha mahajana bankuwa siwuwani ha paswani wagauththarakaruwan lesath nam kota atha. 90 (2) waganthiya anuwa rajaya ho rajaye anubaddhitha aayathanayak ho samanga kumana aakarayaka ho labha labana wyapara katayuththaka yedena ho elesa kriya karanu labana aayathanayaka yam balayak ho nilayak darana ho himikarithwayak darana ayakuta shri lanka parlimenthuwe manthriwarayaku washayen theri pathwimata ho ema dhuraya darimata ho nohaki bawath, eheth ranil wikramasinha rajya anubaddhitha aayathanayan wana lanka bankuwa ha mahajana bankuwata sewa sapayimen wishala washayen labha upayana samagamaka himikarathwaya darannaku bawath pethsamkariya kiya siti. 2002 sita 2006 dakwa kalaya thula kolambaa maha nagara sabhawe ejapa nagarika manthriwariyaka washayen katayuthu kota athi pethsamkariya, ema kala wakawanuwa thulath eki maha nagara sabhawema shri lanka podujana peramunu manthriwariyakwa me wanathuruth katayuthu karamin sitina kalawakawanuwa thulath, itha pahadiliwama danna paridith samagam rejistrar janaralwarayagen laba ganna lada sahathika kala lekhanayanta anuwath, lanka bankuwa ha mahajana bankuwa wethin thorathuru dana ganime panathe widhiwidhana prakarawa labaganna lada likhitha thorathuru anuwath, ranil wikramasinha kotas 38,964k himikarithwaya darana "simasahitha lekhawus printars and pablishars" samagame pradhana kotaskaruwaku wana athara ohu warshikawa emangin labhansha himikaraganna pudgalayakuda washayen thama dana danama nithi wirodhi ha wyawastha wirodhi lesa mema manthri dhuraya daramin sitina bawath prakasha kara siti.
